work-item.field:
Currently a user having project role "project_user" can view, modify, etc. all work item types. During our training we will create a work item type 'question' and use Polarion tasks in connection with questions. These tasks should only be used for responsible persons so project user should only view and modify question work items.
  • Open Administration > User Management > Permissions Management
  • Select Work Items from the +Custom Set menu.
  • Enter a name and a query that specifies the set of work items we want special permissions for
    • Name: Access just for question work items
    • Query: type:task
  • Change the permission options so project_user can no longer view task work items
    Hint: This can also be done in the opposite manner (i.e. remove the view permissions from general work items, create a set for questions, and give permission to view only questions)
  • Your project_ user should now only be able to view question
    Hint: Notice that by default the custom set inherits permissions from the general work items permissions
